scripts.dev: [[ -f config.json ]] && cp config.json packages/sockethub/; cd packages/sockethub && yarn run dev
scripts.start: [[ -f config.json ]] && cp config.json packages/sockethub/; cd packages/sockethub && yarn run start
scripts.integration: yarn run integration:setup && yarn run integration:run; RES=$?; if [[ "$RES" != "0" ]]; then yarn run integration:log; fi; yarn run integration:teardown; exit $RES
scripts.integration:clean: docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1 sockethub-redis-1 sockethub-prosody-1; docker rmi sockethub_sockethub
